CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 3, 1945, p. 17 reads: "FRIENDS GET TOGETHER - Above are Curtis Shepard and his friends shown in a happy mood at the Crawford Grill No. 1. Shown in picture are Georgia Simonson, Hattye B. Hutchinson, Helen B. Thompkins, Mr. and Mrs. Curtis Shepard, Jean Mason, and Hilda Maddox. - Harris Photo." The broadside in background reads: "Veterans of World War, No. 1 & 2, presents a gala breakfast dance & floor show, to be held at the beautiful Ritz Cafe, 55 Fullerton Street, Sat. Nite Jan. 27, Dancing from 10:00 'til ?, Music by Little Charlie Watkins' Melody Kats, biggest little band in Pittsburgh!  Free! $25.00 war bond to holder of lucky no., drawing at 2:00, Admission 55 cents."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Georgia Simonson, Hattye B. Hutchinson, Helen B. Thompkins, Curtis Shepard wearing military uniform, Mrs. Shepard, Jean Mason, and Hilda Maddox, seated in banquette in Crawford Grill No. 1, with broadside in background inscribed "Breakfast Dance & Floor Show...Ritz Cafe"
